hymn.title: Tis my happiness below
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—Gain by Loss

layout.singingstanza: 'Tis my hap -- pi -- ness be -- low Not to live with -- out the cross; But the Sav -- ior's pow'r to know Sanc -- ti -- fy -- ing ev -- ery loss.

lyrics.stanza: 'Tis my happiness below Not to live without the cross; But the Savior's pow'r to know Sanctifying every loss.
Did I meet no trials here, No chastisement by the way, Might I not with reason fear I should prove a castaway?
